AbsoluteZero.title: Absolute Zero
AbsoluteZero.powers: {AbsoluteZero} deals himself 3 Fire Damage. Discard the top 4 Cards of your Deck. Play a Module Card from your Trash.
incapacitatedAbilities: One player may play a card.
One hero may use a power.
One player may draw a card.

openingLines.default: It looks like I'm not the only one who needs to stay cool.

AbsoluteZero.title: Absolute Zero
AbsoluteZero.powers: {AbsoluteZero} deals himself 1 Cold Damage. You may play an Equipment, or Draw 3 Cards and destroy one of your equipment.
incapacitatedAbilities: One player may play a card.
One hero may use a power.
One player may draw a card.

openingLines.default: I suppose I should've expected a frosty reception.

AkashThriya.title: Akash'Thriya
AkashThriya.powers: Shuffle the Environment deck. Put a card from your Hand under the top card of the Environment deck. Draw a card.
incapacitatedAbilities: One player may play a card.
One hero may use a power.
One player may draw a card.

TheArgentAdept.title: The Argent Adept

incapacitatedAbilities: One player may play a card.
One hero may use a power.
One player may draw a card.

openingLines.default: I wonder if I can carry a tune all the way through this.

Benchmark.title: Benchmark
Benchmark.powers: You may play a Software card. {Benchmark} deals 1 Target Lightning Damage equal to the number of Software cards in play.
incapacitatedAbilities: One player may play a card.
One hero may use a power.
One player may draw a card.

Bunker.title: Bunker
Bunker.powers: Draw 3 cards. Discard a card for each of your cards with powers in play. This turn, you may use as many powers as you have cards with powers in play.
incapacitatedAbilities: One player may play a card.
One hero may use a power.
One player may draw a card.

Bunker.title: Bunker

incapacitatedAbilities: One player may play a card.

CaptainCosmic.title: Captain Cosmic

incapacitatedAbilities: One player may play a card.
One hero may use a power.
One player may draw a card.

unusedCaptainCosmic.title: Captain Cosmic
unusedCaptainCosmic.powers: Draw a card. You may play a Construct. Until the start of your next turn, all damage that would be dealt to Hero Targets is redirected to that construct.
incapacitatedAbilities: One player may play a card.
One hero may use a power.
One player may draw a card.

ChronoRanger.powers: Draw a card. Until the end of your next turn, damage dealt to and by {ChronoRanger} is irreducible.
incapacitatedAbilities: One player may play a card.
One hero may use a power.
One player may draw a card.

Expatriette.title: Expatriette
Expatriette.powers: Until the end of the turn, reduce damage dealt by {Expatriette} by 1. Play the top card of your deck. You may use an additional power this turn.
incapacitatedAbilities: One player may play a card.
One hero may use a power.
One player may draw a card.

openingLines.default: I've brought the whole arsenal this time.

Fanatic.title: Fanatic

incapacitatedAbilities: One player may play a card.
One hero may use a power.
One player may draw a card.

Guise.title: Guise
Guise.powers: Draw 1 card. Wait, that's it? Fine, alternatively, play 1 Ongoing and make it indestructible until the end of your next turn.
incapacitatedAbilities: One player may play a card.
One hero may use a power.
One player may draw a card.

openingLines.default: Wait, I'm here? That means I've got a fan! Woo!

Haka.title: Haka

incapacitatedAbilities: One player may play a card.
One hero may use a power.
One player may draw a card.

incapacitatedAbilities: One player may play a card.

incapacitatedAbilities: One player may play a card.
One hero may use a power.
One player may draw a card.

openingLines.default: A chance to take a few more risks, eh?

LaComodora.title: La Comodora
LaComodora.powers: Draw a card. Flip a face-down Card in your play area, treating it as if it were just put into play. Until the end of your next turn, whenever one of your Equipment cards is destroyed, you may put it face-down in your play area.
incapacitatedAbilities: One player may play a card.
One hero may use a power.
One player may draw a card.

One player may draw a card.

TheNaturalist.title: The Naturalist
TheNaturalist.powers: Draw a card. Play a card. Select one of {gazelle}, {rhinoceros} or {crocodile} that the played card has in its text. Until the end of your next turn, you may activate that icon's effects.
incapacitatedAbilities: One player may play a card.
One hero may use a power.
One player may draw a card.

NightMist.title: NightMist
NightMist.powers: Until the end of the turn, when {NightMist} would deal a Hero Target damage, reduce that damage by 1. You may draw a card or play a card.
incapacitatedAbilities: One player may play a card.
One hero may use a power.
One player may draw a card.

openingLines.default: Let's see if I can practice what I teach.

OmnitronX.title: Omnitron-X
OmnitronX.powers: Until the start of your next turn, your Components are indestructible. {OmnitronX} deals 1 Target and themselves Lightning Damage equal to the number of Components in play.
incapacitatedAbilities: One player may play a card.
One hero may use a power.
One player may draw a card.

Parse.title: Parse
Parse.powers: {Parse} may deal 1 Target Projectile Damage equal to the number of cards in the Environment Trash. If damage is dealt this way, shuffle the Environment Trash into the Environment Deck.
incapacitatedAbilities: One player may play a card.
One hero may use a power.
One player may draw a card.
devNotes: This is coded as 'up to 1', but making it actually optional is messy. I'll fix it if there's every something that interacts with it, but since Chrono-Ranger uses similar logic for his optional damage, this is the default for playability.
This might still be a bit strong in certain combos. Allowing this to mess with Villain decks was a bit much, though, due to those that use the discard as a resource.

Ra.title: Ra
Ra.powers: {Ra} deals 1 Target 1 Irreducible Fire Damage. If that target is destroyed, repeat this power.
incapacitatedAbilities: One player may play a card.
One hero may use a power.
One player may draw a card.
Ra.devNotes: The wording is technically 'If a damaged target is destroyed' due to how it'd interact with a theroetical numerology clone, but due to Wrecking Uppercut overlap, I didn't want to make that distinction.

TheScholar.title: The Scholar
TheScholar.powers: Draw a card. Draw a card for each Elemental in play. {TheScholar} deals themselves 1 Irreducible Psychic Damage, increased by 2 for each Elemental in play.
incapacitatedAbilities: One player may play a card.
One hero may use a power.
One player may draw a card.

Setback.title: Setback
Setback.powers: Add 2 tokens to your Unlucky pool. Draw 1 card. If there are more tokens in your Unlucky pool than cards in your hand, Play 2 cards.
incapacitatedAbilities: One player may play a card.
One hero may use a power.
One player may draw a card.

Setback.title: Setback
Setback.powers: Play a card. Reveal the bottom two cards of your deck. If those cards share a keyword, put them into your hand. Otherwise, discard them and add 2 tokens to your Unlucky pool.
incapacitatedAbilities: One player may play a card.
One hero may use a power.
One player may draw a card.

UnusedSetback.title: Setback
UnusedSetback.powers: Add 2 tokens to your Unlucky pool. Move the top 2 cards of your deck under this card. If any pair of cards under this card do not share a keyword, play all of the cards under this card.
incapacitatedAbilities: One player may play a card.
One hero may use a power.
One player may draw a card.
